Message.Msg: I wish all the posts on Yahoo were as informative, warm and interesting as these posts. It's a shame what you'll read on other stock boards. Just bought my first 1000 shares of KO. Always wanted to own some.

Message.Title: The duck:
Message.Msg: What happened to the duck? Somebody eat it???

I think you are right to be concerned about our once great country. We have an increasing number of entitlement cry babies, obese fatties blaming everything but themselves for the fatness and a government that is determined to turn us all into dependent welfare slaves. I plan to resist all these destructive forces and return America to greatness. The stock market will follow.
